summary: This bill, the Change of Ownership and Conversion Improvement Act, amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to streamline the process for institutions of higher education undergoing changes in ownership or converting to nonprofit status. It introduces pre-transaction reviews, establishes application fees for changes of control, and mandates expedited review processes.  The bill also introduces monitoring for institutions that have converted from proprietary to nonprofit status and outlines reporting requirements and a Government Accountability Office review. Fees collected are split with the IRS for application review and post-conversion monitoring.
